kafkawa thamura wayasa awurudu 15 ka gatayek....pera aathmaye miya giyata pasuwa jiwathwa un thama pemwathiyage kusen nawatha bihi wuna yayi saka kerena tharunayek....thama akka ha mawa samaga yahangathawa dinaka piyawa ghathanaya karanu athayi piyagenma sapa labana puthekuge kathawa.....pusan samaga katha karana eheth akuru kiyanna liyanna nodanna mistar nakatha...kuda wiye anathurakin mathakaya ahimi wana nakatha...piwisim gala wiwara karana nakatha...paya 30k 40 k eka digata nidana nakatha...niwasen pana ena kafka aa gaman maga digema thamun nodanna aramunak wenuwen paminena nakatha....ahasin malu, kudallan ada halima ee siyalla gana danna nakatha....ohuge sahayata nodanuwathwama sambandha wena hoshino..nirlingika oshima...ohu/aya sewaya karana nakamura pusthakalaya...ehidi muna gahena kafka...kadukare niwahane nathara karawana kafka...pusthakalaye adhipathiniya mis seyiki...panas wiya ikmawu sekiyita ha aya ma wana 15 wana wiyathi seyiki ta aalen badena kafka...!nakatha wiwara karana piwisum gala haraha kalaya,mathakaya,badim uwamana kisith nathi minis lowen iwath unu athamek eeth minis lowema kotasaka pihiti lowakata athulu wena kafka..nawatha mis sayekige illimen in pitath wana nomala kafka...!dewana loka yuddha kalaye sita ada dakwa wayasata nogiya sebalun mita wasara wissakata pera rachitha githaya ehi athi sangithaye wishishtathwaya.....oba kawara ganaye kiyawannekda?
